thread.title: Dictator audio to be launched in Amaravathi
thread.title_full: Dictator audio to be launched in Amaravathi - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Dictator audio to be launched in Amaravathi
text: The regular shooting of Nandamuri Balakrishna's 99th film, Dictator, is progressing at a brisk pace. Directed by Sriwaas, this film has Anjali and Sonal Chauhan as the female leads. Latest update reveals that the audio of the film will be launched in Amaravathi, the new capital of Andhra Pradesh in the third week of December. The makers are also planning to unveil the first teaser during this Dussehra. Eros International is producing the film in association with Vedaashwa Creations. SS Thaman is scoring the soundtrack.
